dialogue.line: To grow bacteria, you have to provide %%GRnutrition%% and the fitting %%GRbacteria spore%%.
Take the bacteria nutrition and the spores next to the terminal and put the %%GRnutrition in the growspace first%%.
The second step is to activate the growth process by putting the %%GRbacteria spore onto the nutritioned growspace%%.
After some time the bacteria will have consumed the nutrition and you can harvest it.
Its locked, you need an access card to enter. Maybe the staff has one.
